summary: Successfully implemented Skip Authentication feature with PIN code 3103. Added a demo bypass button that reveals a PIN input field, validates the code, and grants full access to the Getnius platform without requiring Google OAuth setup. The feature includes error handling, clean UI design, and keyboard navigation support.
current_status: Getnius app now has two authentication options: Google OAuth (requires setup) and PIN bypass (3103) for immediate demo access. Users can now explore all market intelligence features without any external configuration. The app is fully functional and ready for testing.
